cast.overview: With the price on his head ever increasing, John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.
cast.title: John Wick: Chapter 4

cast.overview: Based on the story of Jesse Owens, the athlete whose quest to become the greatest track and field athlete in history thrusts him onto the world stage of the 1936 Olympics, where he faces off against Adolf Hitler's vision of Aryan supremacy.
cast.title: Race

details.biography: Shamier Anderson is a Canadian film and television actor and music DJ. After starring as Xavier Dolls in the Syfy television series Wynonna Earp for 2 seasons, he pursued roles in American feature films by directors such as Drake Doremus, Brad Furman and Karyn Kusama, among others. He's a graduate in Musical Theatre and Drama from the Wexford Collegiate School for the Arts, Toronto, Ontario, Canada. His brother is film and television actor Stephan James.
details.name: Shamier Anderson
